Operation 'get-transaction' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. The original summary 'Get bank transaction' is too generic and doesn't specify the retrieval mechanism (by ID). The description lacks clarity on what data is returned and doesn't explicitly state the prerequisite about data refresh in actionable terms. The improved version specifies the retrieval method, clarifies the return value (immutable transaction data), and makes the prerequisite more explicit for AI agent decision-making. This helps agents understand when and how to use this operation in the context of the Banking API's transaction retrieval workflow.

data.current_description:
The *Get transaction* endpoint returns a single transaction for a given transactionId.

[Transactions](https://docs.codat.io/banking-api#/schemas/Transaction) provide an immutable source of up-to-date information on income and expenditure.
 
Before using this endpoint, you must have [retrieved data for the company](https://docs.codat.io/codat-api#/operations/refresh-company-data).
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a single bank transaction by ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a single bank transaction for the specified transaction ID. Returns immutable transaction data including income and expenditure information. This operation requires that company data has been previously refreshed. The transaction data provides up-to-date information on financial activity for the specified company and bank connection.
data.reasoning: The original summary 'Get bank transaction' is too generic and doesn't specify the retrieval mechanism (by ID). The description lacks clarity on what data is returned and doesn't explicitly state the prerequisite about data refresh in actionable terms. The improved version specifies the retrieval method, clarifies the return value (immutable transaction data), and makes the prerequisite more explicit for AI agent decision-making. This helps agents understand when and how to use this operation in the context of the Banking API's transaction retrieval workflow.

message: Operation 'list-account-balances' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is too generic. Description lacks clarity on pagination support, required parameters, and return structure. Enhanced version specifies pagination, required path parameters, query parameter support, and explicit prerequisite for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description:
The *List account balances* endpoint returns a list of [account balances](https://docs.codat.io/banking-api#/schemas/AccountBalance) for a given company's connection.

[Account balances](https://docs.codat.io/banking-api#/schemas/AccountBalance) are balances for a bank account, including end-of-day batch balance or running balances per transaction.

Before using this endpoint, you must have [retrieved data for the company](https://docs.codat.io/codat-api#/operations/refresh-company-data).
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve paginated account balances for a company
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of account balances for a given company's bank connection. Account balances include end-of-day batch balances or running balances per transaction. Requires companyId and connectionId path parameters. Supports filtering, sorting, and pagination via query parameters. Returns a paginated response containing AccountBalance objects. Prerequisite: company data must be refreshed before calling this endpoint.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description lacks clarity on pagination support, required parameters, and return structure. Enhanced version specifies pagination, required path parameters, query parameter support, and explicit prerequisite for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description:
The *List accounts* endpoint returns a list of [accounts](https://docs.codat.io/banking-api#/schemas/Account) for a given company's connection.

[Accounts](https://docs.codat.io/banking-api#/schemas/Account) are financial accounts maintained by a bank or other financial institution.
 
Before using this endpoint, you must have [retrieved data for the company](https://docs.codat.io/codat-api#/operations/refresh-company-data).
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve paginated bank accounts for a company
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of bank accounts for a given company's connection. Accounts represent financial accounts maintained by banks or financial institutions, including account numbers, balances, and institution details. Requires companyId and connectionId path parameters. Supports filtering, sorting, and pagination via query parameters. Returns a paginated response containing Account objects. Prerequisite: company data must be refreshed before calling this endpoint.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description lacks pagination details, parameter specifications, and account data richness mentioned in API context. Enhanced version clarifies pagination, required parameters, account data attributes, and prerequisites for AI agent clarity.

data.current_description:

Before using this endpoint, you must have [retrieved data for the company](https://docs.codat.io/codat-api#/operations/refresh-company-data).
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a specific bank account by ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a single bank account for a given accountId. Accounts represent financial accounts maintained by banks or financial institutions, including account numbers, balances, and institution details. Requires companyId, connectionId, and accountId path parameters. Returns an Account object containing account details. Prerequisite: company data must be refreshed before calling this endpoint.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description lacks clarity on required parameters and return structure. Enhanced version specifies all three required path parameters, clarifies the Account object structure, and includes prerequisite information for AI agent decision-making.

Enhanced version clarifies pagination, required parameters, hierarchical structure, and prerequisites for AI agent clarity.

data.current_description:
The *List transaction categories* endpoint returns a list of [transaction categories](https://docs.codat.io/banking-api#/schemas/TransactionCategory) for a given company's connection.

[Transaction categories](https://docs.codat.io/banking-api#/schemas/TransactionCategory) are associated with a transaction to provide greater contextual meaning to transaction activity.

Before using this endpoint, you must have [retrieved data for the company](https://docs.codat.io/codat-api#/operations/refresh-company-data).
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve paginated transaction categories for a company
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of hierarchical transaction categories for a given company's bank connection. Transaction categories provide contextual meaning to transaction activity through hierarchical classification. Requires companyId and connectionId path parameters. Supports filtering, sorting, and pagination via query parameters. Returns a paginated response containing TransactionCategory objects. Prerequisite: company data must be refreshed before calling this endpoint.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description lacks pagination details, parameter specifications, and hierarchical nature of categories. Enhanced version clarifies pagination, required parameters, hierarchical structure, and prerequisites for AI agent clarity.

Before using this endpoint, you must have [retrieved data for the company](https://docs.codat.io/codat-api#/operations/refresh-company-data).
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve a specific transaction category by ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a single transaction category for a given transactionCategoryId. message: Operation 'list-bank-transactions' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, inconsistent_terminology. Original summary is too generic and description is identical to connection-specific variant, creating confusion. Missing clarity that this endpoint aggregates across all connections. Enhanced version distinguishes this operation from list-transactions, clarifies aggregation behavior, specifies required parameters, and includes prerequisites for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description:
The *List transactions* endpoint returns a list of [transactions](https://docs.codat.io/banking-api#/schemas/Transaction) for a given company's connection.

[Transactions](https://docs.codat.io/banking-api#/schemas/Transaction) provide an immutable source of up-to-date information on income and expenditure.
 
Before using this endpoint, you must have [retrieved data for the company](https://docs.codat.io/codat-api#/operations/refresh-company-data).
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve paginated bank transactions across all connections
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of bank transactions for a given company across all connections. Transactions provide an immutable, up-to-date source of income and expenditure information. Requires companyId path parameter. Supports filtering, sorting, and pagination via query parameters. Returns a paginated response containing Transaction objects with transaction details. Note: This endpoint aggregates transactions from all company connections, unlike the connection-specific variant. Prerequisite: company data must be refreshed before calling this endpoint.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic and description is identical to connection-specific variant, creating confusion. Missing clarity that this endpoint aggregates across all connections. Enhanced version distinguishes this operation from list-transactions, clarifies aggregation behavior, specifies required parameters, and includes prerequisites for AI agent decision-making.
